entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json #61727
  • Breaking changes in identity hashing algorythms check #61726
  • InvalidOperationException when decompressed data exceeds request body size limit #61723
  • Generated OpenAPI schema is invalid for nested recursive polymorphic type, even without arrays #61722
  • Invalid type rendering for <script type="application/ld+json"> renders as type="application/ld+json" #61718
  • OpenApi Json schema is incorrect in Dotnet version 9.0.4 #61717
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #61716

Closed

  • Add support for setting security attributes on Http.Sys RequestQueue #61084
    10.0-preview5
  • Blazor application fails while running in production on a Linux container #61549
  • Minimal API validation does not use ProblemDetails #61533
  • Dependency Injection Conflict with Null Parameter in SignalR Hub Methods #61491
    10.0-preview5
  • Perf regression: json #61712
  • Minimal API Validation fails for DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #61558
  • Min API validation fails for Record types #61379
  • Blazor.web.js doesn't work with MapStaticAssets #61713
  • button not responsive in razor page #61521

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling of parsable types in validations generator #61728
    area-minimal, feature-validation
  • Add statically-typed support for wrapping JS interop calls as C# delegates #61721
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25216.37 #61720
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Try register LazyAssemblyLoader to DI in AddInteractiveWebAssemblyCom… #61719
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Add support for setting security attributes on Http.Sys RequestQueue #61325
    feature-httpsys, area-networking, 10.0-preview5
  • [OpenApi] Fix thread static use and write directly to PipeWriter #61700
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 10.0-preview5
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61704
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5
  • Fix Dependency Injection Conflict with Null Parameter in SignalR Hub Methods #61687
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 10.0-preview5
  • Add auto-merges for dependabot PRs targeting main #61725
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • Add auto-merges for SDK updates #61724
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to 17.8.3 #61322
    area-infrastructure
  • Follow-up: Improve stopping renderer, fix identity template #61633
    area-blazor, feature-prerendering, feature-blazor-navigation, .NET 10 Planning
  • Add reflection-based support for wrapping JS interop calls as C# delegates #61673
    area-blazor
  • Associate tagged keys with entries so replacements are not evicted #61529
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
